jobTitle: Master Data Analyst (MDM Cust & Vendor Custodian)

companyInfo.Competitors: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Abbott Labs, bioMérieux

jobDescription: Bio-Rad Laboratories is seeking a highly proactive MDM Custodian who’s passionate about Master Data accuracy and driving products to market. The successful candidate will have excellent communication skills along with knowledge of Master Data and/or ERP Systems (SAP).
